title: Snappy Popcorn Seasoning and Popcorn Salt Variety Pack, Theater Salt, Popcorn Salt, Ranch, Parmesan Garlic, White Cheddar, Cheddar Cheese
features: SALTY & SAVORY BUNDLE; comes with the seasonings & salts to make your favorite flavors at home
SECRET INGREDIENT; add our theater salt to kernels and oil before you pop for the best salted flavor
POPCORN & NUT SALT; fine flake crystals that cling to kernels better than ordinary granulated salt
VERSATILE SEASONING; our low-fat popcorn seasonings give kernels a guilt-free flavor upgrade

description: Our most popular Shaker flavors and signature salts make it easy to take the taste of ordinary popcorn to the next level. Snappyâ€™s Buttery Flavored Theater Salt is the secret ingredient that helps you achieve authentic movie theater popcorn taste at home. Simply measure and pour salt directly into your kettle with oil and popcorn for a consistently delicious treat. Our Popcorn & Nut Salt features fine flake crystals with unsurpassed moisture resistance that cling evenly to popcorn kernels. This ultrafine texture offers much more surface area than ordinary granulated salt, providing exceptional adherence that delivers pure flavor time and time again. Our Shakers are perfect for adding even more flavor to warm, freshly popped popcorn. These easy-to-use blends contain no MSG, saturated fat or trans fat for a guilt-free flavor upgrade. Makes an ideal gift for the popcorn lover in your life! Made in the USA. Snappy Popcorn is a third-generation family business that has been passionate about growing and selling popcorn since 1940. We grow, process and raise much of our popcorn in the fertile fields of Iowa. Popcorn is the only thing we process in our plants and we take great pride in delivering the best tasting popcorn, fresh from our fields to your home. Over the years, Snappy has also grown to become one of the largest concessions dealers in the country by doing things differently. We work hard to provide first-rate machines, superior accessories, and delicious products at the very best prices, all backed by the Snappy quality guarantee. Located in the small town of Breda, Iowa, our small-town values and work ethic are behind every product we sell. We are committed to providing strong, old-fashioned customer service, with a friendly sales staff that will personally answer your calls. Please let us know how we can serve your popcorn and concessions needs, and from our family to your family or business, thank you for choosing Snappy products!
